channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.description:
"The difference between me and Neil in our attitude to movie projects is that he doesn't believe they're going to happen until he's sitting in his seat eating popcorn, and I don't believe they're going to happen."

- Terry Pratchett, alt.fan.pratchett

"Until an unfortunate axe incident, Gloria had been captain of the school basketball team."

- Terry Pratchett, Soul Music

"It gets worse. I have, before now, waited for a pen to perform a macro."

- Terry Pratchett, alt.fan.pratchett

""You've got a lot of time for abstract thought when you've got your hand stuck up a dead badger.""

- Terry Pratchett, Johnny and the Dead

"No one was avoiding him, it was just that an apparent random Brownian motion was gently moving everyone away."

- Terry Pratchett, Reaper Man
